head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MALONEY, REV. EDWARD FRANCIS, S.J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MALONEY, REV. EDWARD FRANCIS, S.J.

block.p: MALONEY -- Rev. Edward Francis, S.J. Past President of Fordham Prep and past Executive Vice-President of Canisius College. Beloved brother of Mary Gilbride, and Richard. Survived by many loving nieces and nephews. Reposing at the Jesuit Community Chapel at Loyola Hall in Fordham University on Friday from 3-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial in the O'Keefe Commons in O'Hare Hall in Fordahm University, Bronx, Saturday, 11 AM. The family requests that in lieu of flowers, donations be sent to the New York Provence of the Society of Jesus at 39 E. 83rd St., NY, NY 10028. For information contact Farenga Bros., Inc.

The family requests that in lieu of flowers, donations be sent to the New York Provence of the Society of Jesus at 39 E. 83rd St., NY, NY 10028. For information contact Farenga Bros., Inc.
